entry.title: location and country/region columns missing on the UDF
entry.content:
Hello experts,

The location and country/region columns are missing on the exported udf even if it's enabled on manage business configuration, and it's listed on sysVisibleUserDirectorySetting as you can see below. Any suggestion please?

entry.title: Employee Central Alerts: Limitation
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Since SAP SuccessFactors introduced specific rule scenarios for configuring Business Rules, we now have the option to use the "Generate Employee Central Alerts" scenario to trigger alerts in EC.

However, I've encountered a limitation: it is not possible to use personal base objects —specifically, Dependent or Employee Information —within this rule scenario. This restriction prevents us from setting up alerts based on conditions such as "employee turns 65" or "dependent reaches 18 years old."

Has anyone found a workaround for this limitation? 

Thanks in advance for any suggestions!

entry.title: Forum for asking questions in SAP SuccessFactors live scenarios
entry.content:

Where can I post my questions regarding the live work scenarios? These are questions that need an experienced person to answer in terms of real life situations. 

Below are the areas I am looking to ask my questions:

SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central, SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting, SAP SuccessFactors Onboarding, SAP SuccessFactors People Analytics Reporting

Thanks in advance, Arul

entry.title: importing employees using optionId
entry.content:
Hello experts,

Is it mandatory to put the optionId instead of the picklist value while importing employees? In my case, when I put the picklist value on the column country, it's empty on the employee profile, but for the location column, it works with the picklist value, both of the fields are associated with a picklist. 

My client does not have Employee Central

entry.title: "My Learning Journey with SAP SuccessFactors: From Beginner to Confident User"
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I recently completed my learning of the SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central and I wanted to share my experience and progress with others who are also starting their journey.

I’ve explored key features like #managing employee data, #organizational structure, #job information, and #workflow. One of the most interesting parts for me was understanding how #Foundation Objects and #MDF object work together to support the core HR processes.

I also learned how important #event reasons, #workflows, and #business rules are when configuring employee lifecycle actions like hiring, promotions, and terminations.

Overall, it has been a great learning experience, and I’m excited to continue learning other modules like #Recruiting and Learning.

If anyone has tips or resources for #hands-on practice or #preparing for certification, I’d love to hear your suggestion

Thank you to the SAP Community for all the helpful blogs and answers!

entry.title: What's the best way to practice SAP SuccessFactors if I’m just starting out?
entry.content: Please share how you started practicing  SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central as a beginner tips are welcome!

entry.title: Fixing Headers & Footers while generating Documents in SAP SF EC
entry.content:
While creating letters in Employee Central, headers and footers move based on the content of the letter. If a letter is short, both remain in their places, but the moment a single line extends in the document, the next page shows the footer as the header and the header comes in the middle of the page.

Is there any fixes/custom process that can glue them so they don't move in Employee Central??

entry.title: How can we create a UI DEEP link for a Custom Non User based MDF object?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We have developed a custom MDF which have externalCode field set as auto number. This MDF is used as business trip application for users. By the standard approach, if we develop this MDF object on the people profile, there are standard limitations for this method in workflows and other parts that we are trying to solve.

We are trying to create a deep link for this non-user based custom MDF. This deep link should not direct towards the employee profile or on manage data screen. It should open the UI that we have created for this custom MDF. However, we are not able to achieve this by any means. 

How can we achieve this? if there is any alternate method for this, please highlight.

 

Thanks in Advance.

Mohammad Ayaz

entry.title: SuccessFactors Report Center People Stories issues with Roles and Groups permissions
entry.content:
Hi,

We got issues with  Group and Roles permission to split data through Vicepresidency, Department, Org Unit, Division.

By business decisions our recruiters can only start a New Requisition to Position with field Vacant=Yes in the SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting module#. At reporting level we need to split the information the recruiters can see, for example one recruiter can only start requisition to vacant position from Vicepresidency A but we need them to see all the requisitions (Vacant=Yes AND Vacant=No) status on a Story Report we build. We create a Target Group with the filter by Vicepresidency, however the process role to open requisitions for only Vacant=Yes positions is not leting them to see all the requisitions, only those with Vacant=Yes. An automatic process change the Vacant field to No once a candidate moves forward the Onboarding proces

Is there any possibility to avoid this conflict on permissions?

Best regards,

Juan

entry.title: deactivate and reactivate module
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I would like to know what happens if a module gets deactivated in Provisioning and reactivated again after a year or so. Will the module appear as empty and everything has to be configured from scratch again? Or does it reactivate with the last settings that were in place before being DEactivated. Would be great if you could share your knowledge.

Thank you and have a great day.

entry.title: Business Rule on TimeSheet number of hours in SuccessFactors
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

As per business requirement, we need to send email notifications/alerts to Manager / HR in case of recorded working hours Time Sheet (SuccessFactors)  are more than planned working hours (as per work schedule).

So in the business rule, I need to put the condition to check the recorded hours and send email/alert accordingly.

Any suggestions how this can be implemented.

Thanks,

entry.title: SF Concurrent Employment - Custom MDF
entry.content:
Hey everyone!
 
I currently have a client who has a strong presence of concurrent employment within their organization. In their practice, they have two types of "concurrent" employees as we know it:
  1. Employees who truly work 2 different positions with different attributes (standard concurrent)
  2. Employees who work different positions and/or location where their key position attributes are the same (ie. someone holds the same position at 2,3,4 or more different locations; or someone 2 different positions at the same location but the position attributes relevant to time, pay, etc. are the same)
In scenario 1, the SuccessFactors Concurrent Employment setup will suffice and is necessary for the purpose of have 2 defined positions in the Org Chart and 2 timesheets. However, in scenario 2, we are presented with a couple of key challenges below: 
  • Multiple position maintenance (ie. HR will be required to create a position in the Org chart for every position/location combination)
  • Multiple profiles and timesheets (1 per assignment), causing a complex end user experience, and potential rounding issues
 
We are reviewing and looking at the use of a custom MDF to handle the positions for  employees within scenario 2 where the key attributes are the same to improve these challenges.
 
If anyone has encountered similar experiences with this type of concurrent employee and has found this custom MDF option to work well, I would love to hear your experiences, limitations encountered, and potential challenges/impacts related to upgrades, and/or new product releases. Any insights related to EC, Time, Payroll,  Recruiting, Onboarding, and Integrations would be greatly appreciated. 
 
Thanks so much!

entry.title: configure object Definition-Visibility Rule
entry.content:
Custom object : EXP ******* Form
Requirement: Restrict form access so that it is available and visible only to employees whose Pay Scale Level is 5 or higher. Employees below Level 5 should not be able to see or access the form in the system. Could plz anyone help with this in step by step process to fallow.

entry.title: SAP SuccessFactors Data Loader
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I read the below in an article and just need to know if we really have any tools like this in SF.

*****************************************************************************************************************

SAP SuccessFactors Data Loader

  • Use Case: While this isn’t a SAP solution outside of SuccessFactors, it’s an important tool for ensuring that data is in the right format when importing into Employee Central.
  • How it Helps:
    • Data Formatting: SAP SuccessFactors Data Loader requires the data to be in a specific format. Using tools like SAP Data Services or SAP MDG to format the data before uploading can ensure smooth integration.
    • Validation Checks: The Data Loader also performs basic validation checks on the data to ensure that it conforms to SuccessFactors standards before proceeding with the upload.

******************************************************************************************************************************

Appreciate your response on this.

Regards,

SR

entry.title: Delimit IT105 when Employee is Terminated via Replication program EC to S4
entry.content:
When employee is Terminated in EC, we use replication program to send update to S4/ERP.

However, the delimiting of IT105 particularly System Username is not delimit.

Is there standard to delimit? Or suggestion of how to go about it?

Thanks.
